queries.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["run_id"] == v.runIds)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "redis_operation_duration_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> sum()
  |> yield(name: "Commands executed")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "redis_operation_duration_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "upper")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["run_id"] == v.runIds)
  |> yield(name: "Max")

from(bucket: "lettuce-test")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "redis_command_latency")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "upper")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["runId"] == v.runIds)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "redis_operation_duration_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["run_id"] == v.runIds)
  |> yield(name: "mean command latency")

from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lettuce_reconnect_total_attempts")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["run_id"] == v.runIds)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "run_id"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / float(v: r.elapsed) })) 
  |> yield(name: "sum")

from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lettuce_reconnect_total_failures")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["run_id"] == v.runIds)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "run_id"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / float(v: r.elapsed) })) 
  |> yield(name: "sum")

charts.name: Endpoint command queue
charts.note: Commands sned to netty Queue but still not writen to channel

queries.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lettuce_endpoint_command_queue")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["runId"] == v.runIds)
  |> yield(name: "Endpoitn command queue")

charts.name: Command Handler Queue size
charts.note: Commands writen to the channel and waiting for response to complete

queries.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lettuce_command_handler_queue")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["runId"] == v.runIds)
  |> yield(name: "Comand Handler Queue")

charts.name: Endpoint Disconnected Queue size
charts.note: Commands buffered in Disconnected buffer while channel is inactive

queries.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lettuce_endpoint_command_buffer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["runId"] == v.runIds)
  |> yield(name: "Command Buffer")

from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lettuce_endpoint_disconnected_buffer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["runId"] == v.runIds)
  |> yield(name: "Disconnected Buffer")

from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lettuce_endpoint_command_buffer")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["runId"] == v.runIds)
  |> yield(name: "Command Buffer")

charts.name: Commands Executed (Errors)
charts.note: Total number of commands completed with errors

queries.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["run_id"] == v.runIds)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "redis_command_total_errors")
  |> sum()
  |> yield(name: "Commands executed with errors")

from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["run_id"] == v.runIds)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lettuce_reconnect_total_attempts")
  |> sum()
  |> yield(name: "Reconnect Attempts")

from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lettuce_command_completion")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["run_id"] == v.runIds)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 }))  // Convert µs to ms
  |> yield(name: "lettuce  command completion")

charts.name: Command Latency Max (per command type)
charts.note: Commands pending to be writen to chanel when autoflush=false

queries.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "redis_operation_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["run_id"] == v.runIds)// multiple runIds possible
  |> group(columns: ["command", "status"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / 1000.0 }))  // µs -> ms
  |> yield(name: "Latency (max) per command+status")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "redis_operation_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["run_id"] == v.runIds)
  |> group(columns: ["_measurement", "_field", "run_id"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / float(v: r.elapsed) })) 
  |> yield(name: "Operations per sec")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "redis_operation_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["run_id"] == v.runIds)
  |> group(columns: ["run_id", "command", "status"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / float(v: r.elapsed) })) 
  |> yield(name: "Operations per sec")

from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lettuce_command_completion")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["run_id"] == v.runIds)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> elapsed(unit: 1s)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / float(v: r.elapsed) })) 
  |> yield(name: "ops_per_sec_by_command")

from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lettuce_reconnect_attempts")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["run_id"] == v.runIds)
  |> drop(columns: ["local", "remote"])
  |> group(columns: ["run_id", "_measurement","epid"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lettuce_reconnect_failures")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["run_id"] == v.runIds)
  |> drop(columns: ["local", "remote"])
  |> group(columns: ["run_id", "_measurement","epid"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "lettuce_reconnection_inactive_duration")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sum") 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["runId"] == v.runIds)
  |> group(columns: ["epid"]) // Group by endpoint ID
  |> cumulativeSum()

from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["runId"] == v.runIds)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "redis_command_total_errors")
  |> yield(name: "Commands executed with errors")

from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "redis_command_errors")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "redis_command_errors")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.bucket )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["run_id"] == v.runIds)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lettuce_reconnect_total_failures")
  |> sum()
  |> yield(name: "Reconnect Attempts (Failed)")
